# NINF

> [Double-precision floating-point][ieee754] negative infinity.

<section class="usage">

## Usage

```javascript
var FLOAT64_NINF = require( '@stdlib/constants/float64/ninf' );
```

#### FLOAT64_NINF

[Double-precision floating-point][ieee754] negative infinity.

```javascript
var bool = ( FLOAT64_NINF === -Infinity );
// returns true
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->

<section class="examples">

## Examples

<!-- TODO: better example -->

<!-- eslint no-undef: "error" -->

```javascript
var FLOAT64_NINF = require( '@stdlib/constants/float64/ninf' );

console.log( FLOAT64_NINF );
// => -Infinity
```

</section>

<!-- /.examples -->

<section class="usage">

### Usage

```c
#include "stdlib/constants/float64/ninf.h"
```

#### STDLIB_CONSTANT_FLOAT64_NINF

Macro for [double-precision floating-point][ieee754] negative infinity.

</section>
